blog.name: thebestdefenderofearth
blog.title: Big Mood
blog.description:
Hispanic | 21 | Bi | She/her

I will protect Tony Stark, Bucky Barnes, and Loki with my life.

We don’t hate anyone on this blog!!! So if you’re anti- anyone then stay away.

Warnings: I rant a lot.

body:
THINGS I WANT IN ENDGAME

1. Tony’s happiness and safe return

2. Tony and Steve reunion/makeup that will make me cry

3. Tony x Nebula friendship

4. Tony x Carol friendship

5. Thor x Carol friendship

6. Carol x Valkyrie meet ;)

7. Rhodey and Tony parallel reunion from Iron Man.

8. Rhodey x Rocket teamup

9. Scott Lang happy and declared an Avenger

10. Aunt May mourning Peter and then reuniting with Peter

11. Pepper Potts suiting up and being a boss

12. Tony and Pepper wedding

13. Thor reunion with his people (and Loki, pls)

14. Carol x Fury x Goose reunion

15. All my badass woman teaming up (Carol, Nat, Pepper, Valkyrie, Nebula.)

16. Steve and Tony forgiving each other and being friends like we deserve.

17. Steve making the sacrifice play to prevent Tony from doing it.

17a. BUT I ALSO WANT STEVE TO HAVE A DAMN BREAK FROM BEING JUST SOLDIER LIKE PLS HAVE STEVE BE HAPPY INSTEAD IN THE 40s

18. Clint x Nat friendship (I NEED IT)

19. Bruce x Tony sciencebro reunion

20. Bruce x Hulk learning to work together.

21. Scott Lang x Hope reunion + Hope meeting the Avengers

22. T’Challa and Okoye + T’Challa and his country

23. Nebula avenging her sister and giving the kill blow

I like soap operas, politics, film and other things. Multifandom. Live to ship. I adore Lestat, but Marius is my lover. Leo sun, Aries rising, Aries Moon.

summary:
Scene: Watching movie with Mom
Mom: He looks like that guy, what's his name? He came out in that movie with Gwyneth Paltrow.
Me:...
body:
Scene: Watching movie with Mom

Mom: He looks like that guy, what’s his name? He came out in that movie with Gwyneth Paltrow.

Me: What movie?

Mom: That movie about a guy, and something’s wrong with his heart.

Me: *Mentally goes through every artsy Gwyneth Paltrow movie* I don’t know, are you sure it was her?

Mom: Yeah, something’s wrong with the guy’s heart. And there are Robots.

Me: Robots? OMG Mom, are you talking about Iron Man?! 

Mom: Yeah Iron Man.

Me: OMG *dying inside* It’s Robert Downey Jr. and you could have just said the superhero movie.

Mom: Superhero?

End Scene

My Mother thinks Iron Man is a Romantic Drama about Gwyneth Paltrow saving Robert Downey Jr. from a heart condition. With Robots.

summary:
Jeon Jeongguk as Tony Stark (13/?)

 “Big man in a suit of armour. Take that off, what are you?” Jimin sneered, rolling his eyes...
caption:
Jeon Jeongguk as Tony Stark (13/?)

“Big man in a suit of armour. Take that off, what are you?” Jimin sneered, rolling his eyes as he crossed his arms.

&;Genius, billionaire, playboy, philanthropist,” Jeongguk replied without missing a beat, smirking as he left the room, an arrogant air around him.

“Unbelievable.” Jimin scoffed.

title: The silver's tears
body:
After New York battle time to go home, but would this be possible? Thor panicks as loki fell unconscious more paler and colder than ever if this was even possible fears of losing his brother again. Thor is protictive and the team start to ask questions and the truth needs to be told

Child of soul

Thor felt him slipping away, he carry him to the nearest sofa , he took his cape and wrapped it around him sitting next to him holding his hand which was cold“Is he…” Clint asked worried“He…

Read more…

blog.name: the0000night0000writer0000
blog.title: The Short Story Corner (among other things)
blog.description: Short stories about a lot of things(mostly Black Butler), as well as my art from time to time.

title: A Serious Conversation
body:
“I’m surprised you’re not more worried about me doing the whole Avenger thing, Max,” Tony said, wincing as the teenager pressed an ice pack to the latest bruise he’d acquired as Iron Man.

“Should I be?” Max asked, looking up at him.  “I mean, yeah I’m a little worried.  You’re my dad, and you go out and do some really stupid and dangerous stuff every day.  But, you’re Iron Man.  I know you can handle it.”  Tony held the ice pack to his ribcage and sighed.

“I just don’t want you worrying about me to impact the rest of your life.  School, friends…and I don’t want to let you down.”  Max finished putting away the first aid kit and came back to rest her hands on her dad’s shoulders.

“Dad.  Enough.  Let me tell you something.”  She took a deep breath.  “You’re the hero this city needs, but not the one it deserves.”  Tony wrinkled his nose.

“What’s that supposed to mean?”  Max smiled slightly.

“New York doesn’t deserve you, Dad.  They don’t appreciate you enough for that.  You, Doc, Agent Barton, heck, even Pete…you’re the best thing that’s happened to this city, to this planet.  Plus, you’re my dad.  That automatically makes you my hero.”  Tony set the ice pack aside for a moment to pull Max into a hug.

“I know I don’t deserve a kid like you,” he muttered.

“Because kids aren’t things you deserve,” Max said.  “They’re a gift.”

“I know, bud.”

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Soldier [Female Steve Rogers]
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2FlqneD

by LilyCarmenBlack

The plan had been simple: get on the plane, crash the Valkyrie, and die. And it worked, or at least, for a little while; that is if sixty-six years could be counted as a while. Awaking in the twenty-first century, Captain America learns to deal with death, to walk with his head held high, and carry on. For Saoirse Rogers-Barnes, life isn’t so simple.

Female Steve Rogers.

SR/BB.

Words: 1636, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of MARCHING ON SERIES

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Captain America (Movies)
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, James “Bucky” Barnes, Nick Fury, Kimberly Proctor, Scott Proctor (Marvel), Rebecca Barnes Proctor, Original Male Character(s), Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, Tony Stark, Bruce Banner, Thor (Marvel), Loki (Marvel), Wanda Maximoff, Pietro Maximoff, Vision (Marvel), 107th Division (Marvel), Timothy “Dum Dum” Dugan, Peggy Carter, Shannon Carter, Jonathan “Junior” Juniper, Jim Morita, James Montgomery Falsworth, Gabe Jones, Jacques Dernier, Sarah Rogers, Joseph Rogers, Winifred Barnes, George Barnes (Marvel), Howard Stark, Abraham Erskine, Chester Phillips, Hydra Agents, SHIELD Agents & Staff, Maria Hill
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers
  • Additional Tags: Female Steve Rogers, World War II, Captain America Steve Rogers, Winter Soldier Bucky Barnes, Awesome Howling Commandos, Brooklyn, 1940s, 1930s, 1920s, Great Depression, Assassins & Hitmen, Spies & Secret Agents, SHIELD, Super Soldier Serum


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2FlqneD

by LilyCarmenBlack

The plan had been simple: get on the plane, crash the Valkyrie, and die. And it worked, or at least, for a little while; that is if sixty-six years could be counted as a while. Awaking in the twenty-first century, Captain America learns to deal with death, to walk with his head held high, and carry on. For Saoirse Rogers-Barnes, life isn’t so simple.

Female Steve Rogers.

SR/BB.

blog.name: morgoona-stark
blog.title: "I am... Iron Man"
blog.description:
Tony Stark is the Strongest Avenger| 
Header by @anthonyed

body:
Endgame reunions

People keep talking about Tony’s reunion with the team or Pepper.

I just want him reuniting with DUM-E with the latter letting out happy beeps and boops on seeing his dad after so long

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Lucky
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2YhqH6P

by armoredsoftie

“I love you. I’ll see you in a couple of days.”

When Tony walked out of the apartment a couple of hours later, suitcase on his hand, Bucky finally allowed himself to smile, excited. He picked up his phone and made a call. After a couple of rings, the person on the other line answered.

“Target is on the move,” said Bucky, and Pepper started to laugh on his ear. “The plan is in motion.”

Words: 2018, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

summary: Earth’s Best Defender; Tony Stark Bingo - S4
title: Earth’s Best Defender; Tony Stark Bingo - S4
body:
Square: S4 - Art Format: Stained Glass

Rating: General

Warnings: None

Pairing: None

Summary: Image of the Iron Man armour flying over the earth, done in watercolour and ink in the style of stained glass.

Link: Also on AO3 here

@tonystarkbingo​

My first square filled. not the one I thought it was going to be, and I really need to work on my watercolour skills, but this didn’t turn out too bad. Although, some details and colour is missing in the scan. Maybe digital would have worked better.

blog.name: morgoona-stark
blog.title: "I am... Iron Man"
blog.description:
Tony Stark is the Strongest Avenger| 
Header by @anthonyed

summary:
It was easy, almost too easy for Stephen to fit into the role of a ... Let's say for now, a villain.
His entire life had been...
body:
It was easy, almost too easy for Stephen to fit into the role of a … Let’s say for now, a villain.

His entire life had been him being the centre for jealousy. Hate and jealousy, had fuelled his story and the text book narcissism just added to the perfect antagonistic image that Stephen provided.

Then came the accident.

And then came the agony.

And now he has magic, the ability to bend the rules of reality at the very tips of his fingers.

His sharp sea green eyes, paired with the goatee and the white streaks of hair and the cloak resting menacingly on his shoulders? It was safe to say that Stephen was meant to be the villain.

But then came Tony Stark.

Protector the Weak, the Golden Avenger, the literal shield of this world. Iron fucking Man.

Nobody noticed the wide, brown eyed Tony Stark, the Tony who hid his emotions away but would coo at babies, the Tony whose PTSD kept him awake late into the night, the Tony who was ready to sacrifice himself, everyone saw a man without a heart instead of a man with a broken one.

Until, they noticed what happens to the same man after being betrayed again and again and again until he finally snapped.

(( I’ve always wanted to write a evil Stephen and Tony power duo but never got to posting this draft. Lemme know what you think))
